Walter von Sch√∂nkopf was the commander of the http://anidb.net/ch6224 [Rosen Ritter]. An expert in ground warfare, he and his unit were important members of the 13th Fleet and later, the Yang Fleet and were responsible for undertaking any of their ground engagements.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Walter von Schonkopf
